description: This dashboard works with postgres_exporter for prometheus

panels.title: General Counters, CPU, Memory and File Descriptor Stats

panels.description: Average user and system CPU time spent in seconds.
panels.title: Average CPU Usage

panels.description: Virtual and Resident memory size in bytes, averages over 5 min interval
panels.title: Average Memory Usage

targets.expr: sum by(instance, datname, namespace) (rate(pg_stat_database_tup_updated{namespace=~"$namespace", datname=~"$datname", instance=~"$instance", service=~"$service"}[$__rate_interval]) != 0)
sum by(instance, datname, namespace) (rate(pg_stat_database_tup_fetched{namespace=~"$namespace", datname=~"$datname", instance=~"$instance", service=~"$service"}[$__rate_interval]) != 0)
pg_stat_activity_count{namespace=~"$namespace", datname=~"$datname", instance=~"$instance", state=~"idle|idle in transaction|idle in transaction (aborted)"}
sum by(instance, datname, namespace) (rate(pg_stat_database_tup_returned{namespace=~"$namespace", datname=~"$datname", instance=~"$instance", service=~"$service"}[$__rate_interval]) != 0)

pg_stat_database_blks_hit{namespace="$namespace", instance=~"$instance", datname=~"$datname"} / (pg_stat_database_blks_read{namespace="$namespace", instance=~"$instance", datname=~"$datname"} + pg_stat_database_blks_hit{namespace="$namespace", instance=~"$instance", datname=~"$datname"})
sum by(instance, datname, namespace) (rate(pg_stat_database_tup_deleted{namespace=~"$namespace", datname=~"$datname", instance=~"$instance", service=~"$service"}[$__rate_interval]) != 0)

panels.description: Total amount of data written to temporary files by queries in this database. All temporary files are counted, regardless of why the temporary file was created, and regardless of the log_temp_files setting.
panels.title: Temp File (Bytes)

targets.expr: sum by(instance, datname, namespace) (rate(pg_stat_database_tup_inserted{namespace=~"$namespace", datname=~"$datname", instance=~"$instance", service=~"$service"}[$__rate_interval]) != 0)

targets.legendFormat: write_time - Total amount of time that has been spent in the portion of checkpoint processing where files are written to disk.
sync_time - Total amount of time that has been spent in the portion of checkpoint processing where files are synchronized to disk.

targets.expr: sum by(instance, datname, namespace, relname, schemaname) (rate(pg_stat_user_tables_seq_tup_read{namespace=~"$namespace", datname=~"$datname", instance=~"$instance", service=~"$service"}[$__rate_interval]) != 0)

sum by(instance, datname, namespace, relname, schemaname) (rate(pg_stat_user_tables_idx_tup_fetch{namespace=~"$namespace", datname=~"$datname", instance=~"$instance", service=~"$service"}[$__rate_interval]) != 0)

sum by(instance, datname, namespace, relname, schemaname) (rate(pg_stat_user_tables_seq_scan{namespace=~"$namespace", datname=~"$datname", instance=~"$instance", service=~"$service"}[$__rate_interval]) != 0)

sum by(instance, datname, namespace, relname, schemaname) (rate(pg_stat_user_tables_idx_scan{namespace=~"$namespace", datname=~"$datname", instance=~"$instance", service=~"$service"}[$__rate_interval]) != 0)

sum by(instance, datname, namespace, relname, schemaname) (rate(pg_stat_user_tables_n_tup_upd{namespace=~"$namespace", datname=~"$datname", instance=~"$instance", service=~"$service"}[$__rate_interval]) != 0)

sum by(instance, datname, namespace, relname, schemaname) (rate(pg_stat_user_tables_n_tup_hot_upd{namespace=~"$namespace", datname=~"$datname", instance=~"$instance", service=~"$service"}[$__rate_interval]) != 0)

sum by(instance, datname, namespace, relname, schemaname) (rate(pg_stat_user_tables_n_tup_ins{namespace=~"$namespace", datname=~"$datname", instance=~"$instance", service=~"$service"}[$__rate_interval]) != 0)

sum by(instance, datname, namespace, relname, schemaname) (rate(pg_stat_user_tables_n_tup_del{namespace=~"$namespace", datname=~"$datname", instance=~"$instance", service=~"$service"}[$__rate_interval]) != 0)

panels.description: Number of rows changed since last auto analyze
panels.title: Rows Since Last Autoanalyze

title: PostgreSQL Database
